title: Axiomatic Constraint Vector Definition Schema
description: Schema defining the structural requirements for the ACVD artifact, used by GAX for policy vetting (S02-S04) and P-01 Finality (S11).

schema_version.description: Version hash tied to the current CSR epoch.

PolicyFloorConfiguration.description: Defines the baseline constraints for Utility Maximization Attestation (UMA I).

UFRM.description: Utility Floor Requirement Metric: Minimum acceptable TEMM score.

CFTM.description: Constraint Failure Tolerance Metric: Penalty or dynamic adjustment to UFRM.

ContextPolicyHash.description: Hash of the runtime environment constraints required for ECVM validation.

MPAM_Threshold.description: Allowed divergence threshold for Manifest Policy Axiom.
